title: The Mysterons
description: A war is started between humans and an alien race called The Mysterons.

title: Winged Assassin
description: The Mysterons seek revenge for the destruction of their Martian base. Their target? No less than the Director General of the Asian Republics. Can Spectrum foil the Mysterons, or will Earth suffer the loss of a great leader

roles.char: Director General of the United Ashian Republic Xian Yoh

title: Big Ben Strikes Again
description: The Mysterons threaten to blow up London with a bomb they have stolen. Spectrum race against time to stop this latest and greatest threat to mankind

title: Manhunt
description: The Mysterons make their first mistake when Captain Black, revealed to have become a Mysteron agent, breaks into the Culver Atomic Centre and is exposed to radioactivity that will enable Spectrum to track him with directional geiger counters.

title: Avalanche
description: When the Mysterons threaten to destroy key links in the Frost Line Outer Space Defence System, Scarlet and Green investigate the mysterious deaths of the personnel at Red Deer Base.

title: White as Snow
description: The Mysterons threaten to kill Colonel White and after their initial attempt fails, White elects to leave Cloudbase so as not to place the other Spectrum agents in jeopardy.

title: The Trap
description: Following the latest Mysteron threat, Scarlet is dispatched to supervise security at the International Air Conference at Glen Garry Castle.

title: Operation Time
description: The Mysterons' cryptic threat to "kill time" has the Spectrum personnel stumped until Magenta realises that their target is General Tiempo, the Commander of Western Region World Defence.

title: Spectrum Strikes Back
description: Two new anti Mysteron weapons (Mysteron detector and gun) are developed from knowledge of the Mysterons. These are shown at a conference below an African hunting lodge. The Mysterons, however, have different ideas. When the Spectrum Intelligence discover Captain Indigo's in the hands of the Mysterons, Captain Scarlet tries to stop him. However, he has a time limit; Indigo has activated the lift mechanism and nicked the master key, trapping everyone below the lodge as the elevator can't be used at the same time as the lift mechanism. Can Scarlet get the key back and reverse the direction of the lift mechanism before Captain Blue, Colonel White, Dr Giadello, General Peterson and even the World President are crushed?

title: Special Assignment
description: The Mysterons threaten to obliterate North America, but Spectrum is left without its number one agent when Scarlet is dismissed for gambling offences.

title: The Heart of New York
description: As the Mysterons threaten to destroy the "Heart of New York", Scarlet and Blue investigate the theft of Grade A Security documents from the Spectrum security vaults.

title: Lunarville 7
description: When the Lunar Controller announces the Moon's independence from Earth in the war of nerves with the Mysterons, Scarlet, Blue and Green journey to Lunarville 7 to investigate reports of an unauthorised complex under construction in the Humboldt Sea.

title: Point 783
description: When the Mysterons threaten the life of the Supreme Commander of Earth Forces, Scarlet and Blue are assigned to escort him to SHEF HQ in New York

title: Model Spy
description: The Mysterons target fashion designer Andre Verdain, secret controller of the European Area Intelligence Service.

title: Seek and Destroy
description: When the Mysterons threaten to kill one of the Angels, Scarlet and Blue are sent to Paris to escort Destiny back to Cloudbase.

title: Renegade Rocket
description: The Mysterons engineer the launch of a Variable Geometry Rocket from Base Concord and their agent, Major Reeves, escapes with the destruct mechanism and target information.

title: Crater 101
description: Scarlet, Blue and Green volunteer for a dangerous mission to remove the power source of the Mysteron complex in Crater 101 before it is destroyed by a low yield atomic device.

title: Shadow of Fear
description: Astronomers at K14 Observatory are monitoring signals from a hidden satellite that has made a successful landing on the Martian moon Phobos.

title: Dangerous Rendezvous
description: Using the Mysteron pulsator recovered from the complex in Crater 101, Dr Kurnitz has developed a transmission device with which Colonel White attempts to contact the Mysterons and sue for peace.

title: Fire at Rig 15
description: When the Mysterons threaten to immobilise the whole of Spectrum, Scarlet and Blue are sent to the Spectrum oil refinery at Bensheba.

title: Treble Cross
description: Captain Black engineers the death of chief test pilot Major Gravener, who is retrometabolised as a Mysteron agent as part of the Mysterons' plan to destroy the World Capital, Futura City.

title: Flight 104
description: When the Mysterons threaten to sabotage a vital conference at Lake Toma in Switzerland, Scarlet and Blue are assigned to escort the world's leading astrophysicist, Dr. Conrad, to Geneva.

title: Place of Angels
description: Mysteron agent Judith Chapman steals a phial of deadly K14 virus - enough to kill ten million people - from Biological Research Station D near Manchester.

title: Noose of Ice
description: Tritonium alloy mining operations at Hotspot Tower in the North Pole are threatened when a Mysteron agent cuts the power to vital heating elements.

title: Expo 2068
description: A lorry carrying an atomic core reactor to the new Manicougan power complex falls into the hands of the Mysterons who intend to strike the Atlantic Seaboard of North America.

title: The Launching
description: When the Mysterons threaten to destroy President Roberts within twelve hours, Scarlet is assigned as bodyguard to the sceptical President.

title: Codename Europa
description: The Mysterons threaten to destroy the Triumvirate of Europe, the three most powerful men on Earth after the World President.

title: Inferno
description: Captain Scarlet and the rest of Spectrum are in a desperate race against time to defeat the Mysteron's latest threat. The total destruction of the massive desalination plant at Najama, high in the Andes Mountains.

title: Traitor
description: The ultimate mind game is unleashed, Spectrum, turned against itself. Captains Scarlet and Blue travel to outback Australia in a desperate attempt to unravel the Mysteron plans before it is too late.

title: Flight to Atlantica
description: When the Mysterons threaten to destroy the World Navy Complex at Atlantica, Blue and Ochre fly a V17 Air Force bomber to destroy a wreck that has been sighted drifting towards the base.

title: Attack on Cloudbase
description: After the Mysterons threaten Spectrum's Cloudbase headquarters, a large fast-moving trace appears on the radar.

title: The Inquisition
description: Captain Blue disappears from a restaurant. He awakes to find it is 3 months later and Spectrum Security want to know where he has been, and if he is even the real Captain Blue.
